title: How private are the 'Upload' and 'Save As' dialogs?
content:
As a privacy-conscious user, I always worry about the 'Save As' dialog, and especially the 'Upload' dialog.

I know the Upload dialog enables websites to perform certain operations of files without even uploading them.

Can anyone please clarify: How much access to my computer do these dialogs give websites? Can they see all the files in the selected folder, even files I haven't selected? Can they look inside sub-folders, or even the parent folders? Can they tell the full path of the directory? Do they know my PC name?

I want to be sure.
creator: MartyJames

title: descofiguración de iconos de busqueda en barra de tareas y en escritorio de mi pc
content: Hace dos dias bajé un firmware y al tratar de abrirlo lo hice con mozilla , eso desconfiguró los iconos de mi pc al punto de que me hace dificil saber cual es el buscador pues solo aparece mozilla en todos los buscadores y además en escritorio ocurrió algo similar con muchas aplicaciones que están marcadas con flecha de acceso directo. Así mismo sale un mensaje de: He decidido abrir ItopDataRecovery.exe

title: gmail, youtube vb

title: visibilità icona firefox e thunderbird in barra applicazioni
content: Da alcuni giorni, nella barra applicazioni non compaiono più le icone di firefox e thunderbird ma appaiono soltano due rettangoli con angolo superiore destro piegato. Sul desktop, invece, le icone appaiono correttamente. Per visualizzarle correttamente nella barra applicazioni, ci devo cliccare, con dx mouse, selezionare aggiungi a barra applicazioni e, subito dopo, rimuovi da barra applicazioni. Le icone riappaiono ma solo fino a quando non sospendo o chiudo windows.
creator: m49.2019

title: Google Drive file details error
content: Lately in Google Drive I get this error when I select one image or a file: Impossible load details. Retry. I have Firefox 108 version, on Edge and Chrome all is OK. Also the troubleshoot mode doesn't resolve the problem.

title: Restored saved google/id logins on new session
content: I usually sing in/up several websites & extensions like workona , linkdin, quora , udemy etc but after turning off my computer or closing firefox, & returning on new session, the tab logins automatically restores & I have to login again. How to fix it ?

title: Momentum for Scrolling Firefox Tabs in macOS
content: In Windows, scrolling many open tabs automatically accelerated. This function is not available in Firefox for macOS, which makes scrolling open tabs so slow and frustrating. Is there anyway to enable momentum in scrolling Firefox tabs in macOS?
creator: AYD

title: browser.bookmarks.openInTabClosesMenu=false does not apply to the synced tabs menu
content:
Hello there!

Up until mid-November 2022 approxmately, I was able to open multiple synced tabs by holding down the Ctrl key. The synced tabs would then open in new tabs in the background, while the menu would remain open.

Since an update, the behaviour has changed, and opening a synced tab now automatically closes the menu, which is most annoying, as when I change computers, I most often have several synced tabs to reopen, not just one.

browser.bookmarks.openInTabClosesMenu=false does not apply to the synced tabs menu, and I was not able to find any other option that would help.

browser.tabs.loadBookmarksInBackground=true does not help either.

What am I missing? As far as I can remember, it worked out of the box until a few weeks ago! (the menu would not close upon opening a synced tab in a new tab, holding down the Ctrl key). The issue appeared after a Firefox update on my 4 devices.

Many thanks in advance!
creator: eric181

title: Firefox will not download Spectrum's security suite extension
content:
I have a problem with Firefox 107.0.1 that needs your expertise. I’ve used Firefox since version 12 with no problems.

My Macbook Pro (on Catalina 10.15.7) is running Spectrum’s (Charter) Security suite and requires installing a spectrum extention in each browser. The extension installs on Safari (my backup browser), but won’t install in Firefox. Spectrum app takes Firefox to the web site to download extension, but nothing happens. Site can’t install the extension. The link is below. What’s the fix? Thank you for your effort. John Holland hollandhouse@woh.rr.com

https://download.sp.f-secure.com/firefox-extension-install/prod/browsing-protection.firefoxextension.xpi

The Macbook Pro is 15” Retina made 2015 2.8 ghz quadcore Intel I-7 16gb 1600 mhz DDR3
creator: hollandhouse
